name: RNA-Seq normalization
description: Execute normalized based on several different published RNA-seq normalization methods

raw_counts.description: The input raw count matrix. Must be an integer-based table.
raw_counts.name: Count matrix:

normalization_method.description: The method to use for normalization. See the help for explanation of each method and references.
normalization_method.name: Normalization method:

log_transform.description: Should the results of the normalization be log2 transformed. Typically not performed for RNA-seq.
log_transform.name: Log2 transform result:
